CitationReferenceCaptionFormat.description: Specifies the caption format of the citation reference, either as a number or as the annotated key.

ShowTooltipForCitationReference.description:
Enables a tooltip for a specific citation reference format.
The requestCacheTTL specifies the expiry for a citation text that is locally cached in a browser before a new ajax-request is made.
To force a browser to renew the display before the cache is expired, delete the 'scite.cache' localStorage from the browser.

TooltipRequestCacheTTLInSeconds.description:
Specifies the time-to-live (TTL) in seconds for caching tooltip content.
Set to false to disable the cache.
The default is 86400 seconds or 24 hours.

MetadataResponseCacheType.description: Setting to regulate the caching of response that is received from a metadata.

MetadataResponseCacheLifetime.description:
Specifies the time-to-live (TTL) in seconds for caching of response that is received from a metadata.
The default is 86400 seconds or 24 hours.

NumberOfReferenceListColumns.description: Number of columns displayed for the reference list.

ResponsiveMonoColumnCharacterBoundLength.description: Responsive columns depend on a browser to select an appropriated number of columns based on the screen width, yet it is possible to limit the responsiveness to a mono list when the character length of the produced reference list is lower than that for the given setting.

ReferenceListType.description: Specifies the reference list type of which can be either 'ol' or 'ul'.

BrowseLinkToCitationResource.value: Whether to generate a 'Browse' link to a citation resource or not.

ReferenceListCacheType.description: Specify which cache type to be used, if no cache should be used at all, use CACHE_NONE.

EnabledStrictParserValidation.description: Whether a strict validation on behalf of the #scite parser should be enabled or not.

EnabledCitationTextChangeUpdateJob.description: Whether an update job should be dispatched for changed citation text or not.
